name: Ice Princess Mermaid Beauty Salon – Fun dress up and make up game for little stylist
name_original: Ice Princess Mermaid Beauty Salon – Fun dress up and make up game for little stylist
description:
Time to glam up the mermaid princesses in your frozen fashion salon.

Don’t we all girls love a splendid time spent at the beauty salon and spa?

In Ice Princess Mermaid Beauty Salon get deep underneath the sea, in the frozen Ice princesses mansion and spend a day styling the mermaid princesses. Be the makeup stylist that you always want to be try all the new makeup technique and express your make up salon talent in this mermaid princess salon game.

So get ready to style up your own makeup story and the best ice princess makeup salon expedition is yet to begin.
